## Forelesninger

```{r, echo=F, message=F, warning=F}
library(kableExtra)
library(dplyr)
forel <- 13
source(paste0(rprojroot::find_rstudio_root_file(),'/inst/forelesningsnotater/timeplan.R'))
timeplan <- df1
kableExtra::kbl(timeplan) %>% kableExtra::kable_paper(full_width = F) %>% kableExtra::row_spec(forel, bold = T)
```
